评论概述: Beautiful design on a quality shirt.
评论详情: The shirt itself is true to size, and is made of a soft but heavyweight cotton material. The design itself is expertly screen printed with no deviations in the margins. I have received tons of compliments on this uniquely designed t-shirt. Would recommend.

评论概述: I liked this more than I thought I would
评论详情: First, the shirt, while listed at 100% cotton, doesn't quite feel that way. It's got a much more blended feel, not nearly as soft as an all-cotton shirt typically feels. That being said, it is quite a nice, solid quality shirt, having a good, substantive feel. It might be a bit thick for some of the hotter weather, to each their own. For me, I found it simply feeling better and better as I wore it.  It felt a bit stiff at first, and yet I warmed up to it rather quickly, and appreciated the high-quality feel of it more and more. As for the design, I was wondering if it would be a bit much. That too quite quickly faded into the background, and yet not without having some style and distinction.  All told, I wasn't sure how I would feel about this shirt, and yet it has quite easily vaulted into my top tier of tee-shirts to wear. Easy shirt to recommend.
i got this for my husband for everyday wear and he loved it. it is perfect to run errands in or go to the amusement part. it is lightweight and looks exactly like the photo. good quality as well.

This shirt looks great, and its good quality as well.  Its a pretty thick material as far as t-shirts go, so its not the thin, breathable type.  Its like a thick and sturdy, good quality cotton type feel.  (and I see...literally 100% cotton.)  Size wise I go between Med-Large as I am stocky build, went with the large, and I find it fits me quite well.  (I like a loose-fit so I always default to large unless I suspect european or other sizing.)  So no such issues here...fits well, looks great...very good quality.  Love it.

I like my t-shirts to be sturdy and thick, and this was just that. It fit as a true 2XL and the material is high quality. The design print on the shirt is very firm and it more than likely won’t peel off.
This shirt runs to size and is stylish and comfortable.
was very impressed with the quality of the product I received. It was exactly what I was hoping for. The product arrived quickly and was exactly as described. I'm very pleased

This shirt runs a bit short and wide, which is the only negative I have about it. The design is cool and the materials are nice, it's just one of those shirts that's atypically sized.  If you're looking for a bit more room and a slightly shorter shirt than normal, this could be a good one for ya.
